name: places/ChIJm5J1zwf2wokRfJcAYCyrp4A
formattedAddress: 245 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 245 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: Pretty good translation. Love the idea of reviewing/revising the document before final print. The price was reasonable. The only thing I didn't like is that I thought they were open until late. I called to say that I was going to pick up my document at 6:30 on Friday and Mr. Johnson told me they were closing at 5, that I had to go on Saturday or Monday. We agreed I was going on Monday 08/13/18. I went to the office on Monday and it was close. When I called, someone told me that Mr. Johnson was ill and that I had to go back on Tuesday. Thank God they answer the phone but I have to reschedule everything because of Mr. Johnson illness. I understand people get sick but it would be beneficial for all parts if someone is available to handle a doc that was ready a few days ago.  But so far,  I would definitely try to do business again with them. That's the only reason why I didn't give a 5 stars.

originalText.text: Very unhappy with this company! I never received my translation ! I called multiple times where is my document I paid for. I sent them 2 email with change of address they never processed. Guy on phone did not give me chance to talk and hang up phone. So disappointed!

text.text: Very unhappy with this company! I never received my translation ! I called multiple times where is my document I paid for. I sent them 2 email with change of address they never processed. Guy on phone did not give me chance to talk and hang up phone. So disappointed!

originalText.text:
Really good experience! First I paid the service and after 4 days I got the translation (in Italian) by email to confirm if everything was correct, after gave them the okay to do the real translation, I paid U$12 more for an express shipping, and in 3 days I finally have my documents in really good quality.
Please guys, keep working on this way. I appreciate a lot your service!
And if someone wants to ask my about MEJ, feel free to do it, I'm going to say the same: I recommend your service!
Thank you all!
Lucas Cilia

originalText.text: I went to speak to mr.mill and he was great. Very professional. He was able to get the job done. This is a good place if you need your paperwork done on a timely manner and their very discrete. My documents looked amazing. I recommend this place to everyone. I will be coming back to proceed doing further paperwork that needs to be translated. I had set it up for overnight and once I came into the office everyone was very polite and had my documents ready. I am not sure why other people say they lack customer service because in my opinion I think they go beyond their ways to get the job done.

originalText.text: I called several times to get information regarding a legal document I needed translated. It was a one page document, nothing significant, but this company is disorganized and unprofessional. No one returned any of my calls. I decided to call one last time and the owner answered the phone and was agitated that he had to talk to a customer, was really impatient and snapped at me. Based on the reviews below, others had similar experiences, but each time the owner responds and claims it is a "fraudulent review"....maybe this company should improve their customer service instead of fighting with people on Google. There are better places to get a translation where you won't be treated so badly.
